item.title: How do i make max levels?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Search for

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

Replace yours with mine

[CODE] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
    		return lvl;
		}
		}
		return 99;

}[/CODE]

To increase the max level just replace the 99’s with whatever number you want.

(By that i mean the 99 in

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {

and

return 99;
